data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/blinkninjagifgo.gif?t=1611616426[/img]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/early_access_40_V1.jpg?t=1611616426[/img]

Aim Lab is still in beta. It’s about 40% complete right now so there will be bugs! Make sure to follow our devlog updates and join our Discord channel to give us feedback along the way.

The latest update: Check out our new creator studio. Now, you can build Aim Lab training tasks from scratch. Create custom maps with insane exterior terrains, hundreds of items and an array of different bots and behaviors with custom pathing. Need a specific training task and environment for CS, Valorant, COD, Siege and all the others? Now you can build it! 

[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/what_people_say_V3.jpg?t=1611616426[/img]

[h2]“The best aim trainer on the market easily highly recommend this.”[/h2] - [b]Mr Bombastic[/b] (Steam Review)

[h2]“Best aim trainer I have tried so far, can definitely feel myself improving after even the first handful of games and the data and visualizations are super helpful.”[/h2] - [b]Toast[/b] (Steam Review)

[h2]“Very usefull, simple to configure, well done !”[/h2] - [b]Riton de Lyon[/b] (Steam Review)

[h2]“If you have a program like this it will save you hundreds of hours” [/h2] - [b]Tommy “Potti” Ingemarsson, 10 time Counter-Strike world champion.[/b] (Motherboard article: “These Neuroscientists Think They Can Get You More Headshots”)

[h2]“What a fascinating mesh of technologies this brings to the scene. If enough players embrace Aim Lab, Statespace could really shake up the esports scouting dynamic.” [/h2] - [b]Jay Masaad, Esports Insider[/b] (Esports Insider article: “Statespace Brings Neuroscience to Esports”)

[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/Download_for_free_now-V1.jpg?t=1611616426[/img]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/Skill_Data_(Resized).jpg?t=1611616426[/img]

[h2]GET DETAILED FEEDBACK AND STATS[/h2] Identify your weaknesses and eliminate them. Aim Lab tasks measure your performance by skill and provide detailed analytics and insights on how to improve. Your Aim lab data profile shows your performance across tasks and skills to help you measure your progress over time.
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/(1)_DETAILED_FEEDBACK_AND_STATS.gif?t=1611616426[/img]

[h2]CHOOSE YOUR GAME SETTINGS AND GO![/h2] Pick the game settings that you want to use, check your graphics settings and go! You can input the sensitivity for the game you play without needing to mess around with converters. Just select the game title from our list of over 500 FPS & TPS titles. 

[table]
[tr]
	[td]• Apex Legends[/td]
	[td]• Battalion 1944[/td]
	[td]• Battlefield[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]• Call of Duty: Black Ops 4[/td]
	[td]• Call of Duty: Modern Warfare(2019)[/td]
	[td]• CS:GO[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]• Destiny 2[/td]
	[td]• Diabotical[/td]
	[td]• Escape from Tarkov[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]• Fortnite[/td]
	[td]• Minecraft[/td]
	[td]• Overwatch[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]• Paladins[/td]
	[td]• PUBG[/td]
	[td]• Quake[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]• Rainbow 6 Siege[/td]
	[td]• Realm Royale[/td]
	[td]• Reflex Arena[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]• Ring of Elysium[/td]
	[td]• Rules of Survival[/td]
	[td]• Rust[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]• VALORANT[/td]
	[td]• Team Fortress 2[/td]
	[td]• Warface[/td]
	[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/(2)_EASY_TO_SET_UP_AND_MAP_GAME_SETTINGS.gif?t=1611616426[/img]

[h2]GO BEYOND AIM TRAINING[/h2] Great FPS players have fundamental skills beyond aim. You will need to train your visual detection speed, attention capacity, short term memory, audio-spatial skills, and decision-making. Aim Lab can help you train all of the skills required to become a legend. 

[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/capacitygifgo.gif?t=1611616426[/img]


[h2]CUSTOMIZE YOUR ROUTINE[/h2] Customize every detail of your training, from weapons, to crosshair settings, and tasks. Train with your controller! 

[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/(3)_CUSTOMIZE_(ALMOST)_EVERYTHING_-_Weapon.gif?t=1611616426[/img]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/(3)_CUSTOMIZE_(ALMOST)_EVERYTHING_-_Task.gif?t=1611616426[/img]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/Keybinding.png?t=1611616426[/img]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/(5)Graybox_Map_Customizer.png?t=1611616426[/img]

[h2]BUILD TRAINING TASKS FROM SCRATCH[/h2] Our creator studio let's you create custom maps with insane exterior terrains, hundreds of items and an array of different bots and behaviors with custom pathing. Need a specific training task and environment for CS, Valorant, COD, Siege and all the others? Simple. Now you can build it to take your aim to the next level!
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/Aim_Lab_Creator_Studio__18___1_-resized.png?t=1611616426[/img]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/Aim_Lab_Creator_Studio__19_.png?t=1611616426[/img]

[h2]WEAPONS GALORE[/h2] Pistols? Got ‘em. Shotguns? Got ‘em. Assault Rifles? Sniper Rifles? Rocket Launchers? Yes, yes, and yes. Hitscan weapons, projectile weapons, and shooting orbs. You won’t go empty-handed. 
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/(4)_Maps_and_Weapons.gif?t=1611616426[/img]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/Weapon_Editor(3-Resized).jpg?t=1611616426[/img]
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/714010/extras/Custom_Recoil_Pattern_(Resized).jpg?t=1611616426[/img]
data.strSnippet: Aim Lab is the ultimate FPS/TPS training program for gamers of all levels. Build your flicking, tracking, speed, perception, and cognition skills and rank up in games like Valorant, CS:GO, CoD, Apex, and more. Train your aim for free.
